main event: A civilian in Bradford, Ohio observed an orange-dull white object traveling westward for 4-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was higher in altitude than normal jets and made no sound.
The witness described the object as having a dull, hazy appearance, with a slightly bright rim around the edges.
The object appeared to stand still at times and suddenly speed up before disappearing.
The witness estimated the object's angular size as covering about 75 degrees of their field of view.
The witness reported seeing a few stars and a bright full moon in the clear night sky during the sighting.
